title: Living and Non-living things (US)
brief_description: Looks at what living and non-living things do that makes them differ, using two young boys at play in a suburban back-yard, a dog having puppies, a car etc, to illustrate this point. Educational Collaborator: George G. Mallinson, Michigan University.
